info.name: ERP RBAC API - Module-Based System
info.description: Complete API Collection for ERP with Module-Based Role Access Control (RBAC) - Updated with user_identity authentication, module system, user management, password management with bcrypt hashing, subscription management system with tiered pricing, payment tracking with mark-as-paid functionality, subscription renewal API, and admin subscription plan management

item.name: Logout by User ID (when token expired)

query.description: Get nested tree structure for specific parent module

body.raw:
{
  "category": "Test Category",
  "name": "Test Module",
  "url": "/test/module",
  "icon": "Test",
  "description": "Test module for validation",
  "level": 1,
  "subscription_tier": "basic",
  "is_active": true
}

{
  "category": "Test Category",
  "name": "Child Test Module",
  "url": "/test/module/child",
  "icon": "TestChild",
  "description": "Child test module",
  "parent_id": 90,
  "level": 2,
  "subscription_tier": "basic",
  "is_active": true
}
